skins.shipDescription: First ship of the Shoukaku-class aircraft carriers, Shoukaku.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Shoukaku, the flagship of the Fifth Carrier Division. Because my super smart senpai went and got themselves all killed, I had to carry the flag of the Sakura Empire¡¯s carrier divisions. Though I was more accomplished than them, for whatever reason, I was always considered weaker. Maybe it was due to my "lack of grace and speed" during my final moments... With that said, allow me to reintroduce myself. I am Shoukaku, the punching bag of the Sakura Empire. Please take care of me from now on~
skins.acquisition: As the flagship of the Fifth Carrier Division, I, Shoukaku, shall do my best to become as good as those esteemed senpai in the First Carrier Division, or something... *giggles* That was on purpose~
skins.login: Intelligence is said to be a woman¡¯s virtue, but that often puts me at odds with those senpai of mine. How troublesome~
skins.details: The melody of my flute is a requiem for the dead. Shall I play it for you?
skins.secretaryIdle1: To always be dealing with those senpai from the First Carrier Division... Commander, you must have a really strong liver.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Though our relationship was once one of victim and perpetrator, I look forward to working with you, Lexington.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Zuikaku, if you keep causing trouble for our Eagle Union colleagues, you¡¯ll only get tempura for dinner tonight~
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, would you like to hear me play my flute?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, come and indulge yourself in Shoukaku's tenderness.

skins.ENClientName: The Crane that Dances With the Wind
skins.shipDescription: I prepared this outfit just for the occasion, so... Commander, you're not going to disappoint me, are you? Hehe~?
skins.acquisition: I prepared this outfit just for the occasion, so... Commander, you're not going to disappoint me, are you? Hehe~?
skins.login: I wonder how you plan on asking me out to the banquet, Commander~ I'm looking forward to it, just a little. Hehe~?
skins.details: All flowers must wither, all leaves must fall, and all dances must end... But right now, forget about all that and lose yourself in the moment.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Zuikaku, you're being too nervous. Just do what your sister tells you to. First, relax, just relax...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Before the banquet begins, shall we practice one more time?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Who will be the star of tonight's show? Will it be me... or us? Hehe~?
skins.secretaryTouch: Don't worry, Commander, all you have to do is follow my steps slowly~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Just what are you doing, Commander? Please keep your eyes on mine when we're dancing~

skins.shipDescription: Hehe, this kind of work is a simple matter for me. Commander, please look forward to my performance~
skins.acquisition: Hehe, this kind of work is a simple matter for me. Commander, please look forward to my performance~
skins.login: Doesn't the breeze today feel quite pleasant~?
skins.details: Zuikaku... She seems to be having difficulty adjusting to this kind of work. Commander, would you be able to look after her?
skins.secretaryIdle1: This kind of work isn't so bad once you get used to it. Hehe~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, after I finish my work over here, would you take me out for a ride? Oh, and Zuikaku too, right~?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Oh my, Akagi and Kaga couldn't make it today? What a pity~ I wish they could see the face you're making right now, Commander~
skins.secretaryTouch: My hair's a bit messed up? Oh, thanks for the reminder, Commander.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You're welcome to sink into my warmth, but you'll have to wait until after work~
